h3_39: University of Kansas School of Medicine (Wichita)
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_81: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Our program has been approved for the ESIR program by the ACGME. All expenses paid for presentations at national/international conferences. A stipend is given to each resident attending the AIRP course. Each incoming resident is given an iPad plus books to complete required reading. Third year residents are sent to a Core Review Course and given Crack the Core series. Our institution offers free meals on site and free parking right next to hospital.
